page.description: Fires before the List is persisted to Local Storage.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object that contains the following properties:

property.name: userData
property.description: Optional user data to persist to local storage.

discussion.p: The *[js:onBeforePersistToLocalStorage]* event is called before data is persisted to local storage. This event can be used to store custom user data in local storage, such as preferences or calculations, by adding it to the *[js:e.userData]* object.
